sentence.Network_en: A branch of the Niger - Congo language family , spoken in the upper Niger River valley.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个可以从尼日尔河的支流到达的地方.

sentence.Network_en: He went to the Congo to examine a new volcano.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾去刚果察看一座新火山.

sentence.Network_en: In June, 1960, the Congo was plunged into five years of civil war and political anarchy.
sentence.Network_cn: 1960年的6月，刚果陷入了5年的内战和政治上的无政府状态。
